1: Chwäch la quinkeb wi, Ajawaxel, ruc' bochi'nic; lal, ri cajawin la pa ri caj.
2: Ruc' bochi'nic cujkeb chuwäch ri Ajawaxel, ri ka Dios, jacha' ri cuban ri ala ri pataninel cäca'y che ri u k'ab ri rajaw achi, jacha' ri cuban ri ali pataninel cäca'y che ri u k'ab ri rajaw ixok, keye'm chi quel na u c'u'x chke.
3: Chel c'u'x la chke Ajawaxel; chel c'u'x la chke, man cäkach'ij ta chi c'ut ri yok'onic ri caquiban chke;
4: ¡oc'owinak u wi' ri c'ax ri ka rikom rumal ri retz'bexic ka wäch cumal ri k'inomab xukuje' ri retzelaxic ka wäch cumal ri e banal tak nimal!
